channel.title: Adding some lunar spells
channel.description: I have a server from project dungeonfest and I would like to add spells like these: heal other, cure me, cure other, heal group (3x3 area) cure group ( also 3x3 area) and vengence other. How do I do that? Is there a tutorial? Can anyone help me at all?

item.title: Adding some lunar spells
